name: Double V Predictive Service
description: Python FastAPI service for revenue forecasting and risk analytics

STRAPI_API_TOKEN.description: Strapi API token for service-to-service authentication

STRAPI_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Secret for verifying webhook HMAC signatures

DATABASE_URL.description: Optional direct database connection (if not using Strapi API)

EXCHANGE_RATE_API_KEY.description: API key for currency exchange rates

CORS_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins

scripts.postdeploy: python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
